resources.string: Mix and Match is a pairing game where a player must pair two similar images within a given time.There are different difficulties to choose from as well as the mode of time. Players can input their usernames and see their rankings on the leaderboard. The game also has the settings to modify the sound of the game and delete the data of their current progress.Mix and Match, a game that you\'ll enjoy!

Welcome to our app – BrainTeasers’ Mix and Match! We are a team of passionate developers who strive to create innovative and user-friendly applications for our users. Our mission is to provide you with the best possible experience and help make your daily life easier. We believe in constant improvement, and your feedback is invaluable to us. Thank you for using our app and please do not hesitate to reach out to us with any questions or suggestions. BrainTeasers consists of three mobile application developers: Kai Yaneza, Angelo Echano, and Renze Meinard Mortiga. They are BSIT 2A students who prepared this application to suffice the requirements of their subject IT 112: Mobile Applications – instructed by their astounding adviser, Professor Norianne Calleja Lamadrid.
